name: Cerium(III) bromide
desc: Cerium(III) bromide is an inorganic compound with the formula CeBr3. This white hygroscopic solid is of interest as a component of scintillation counters.
Other anions:
Cerium(III) fluoride
Cerium(III) chloride
Cerium(III) iodide
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
